special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The apprentice is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation

descriptions.raw: 1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
